mapper.sql: a.id as id ,a.shijianrenshu_id as shijianrenshuId ,a.yonghu_id as yonghuId ,a.shijianrenshu_liuyan_text as shijianrenshuLiuyanText ,a.insert_time as insertTime ,a.reply_text as replyText ,a.update_time as updateTime ,a.create_time as createTime
mapper.select:
SELECT
,shijianrenshu.qiye_id as shijianrenshuQiyeId ,shijianrenshu.shijianrenshu_name as shijianrenshuName ,shijianrenshu.shijianrenshu_uuid_number as shijianrenshuUuidNumber ,shijianrenshu.shijianrenshu_photo as shijianrenshuPhoto ,shijianrenshu.shijianrenshu_types as shijianrenshuTypes ,shijianrenshu.shijianrenshu_clicknum as shijianrenshuClicknum ,shijianrenshu.shijianrenshu_text as shijianrenshuText ,shijianrenshu.shijianrenshu_content as shijianrenshuContent ,shijianrenshu.renwuzhuangtai_types as renwuzhuangtaiTypes ,shijianrenshu.shangxia_types as shangxiaTypes ,yonghu.yonghu_name as yonghuName ,yonghu.yonghu_phone as yonghuPhone ,yonghu.yonghu_id_number as yonghuIdNumber ,yonghu.yonghu_photo as yonghuPhoto ,yonghu.yonghu_email as yonghuEmail
FROM shijianrenshu_liuyan a left JOIN shijianrenshu shijianrenshu ON a.shijianrenshu_id = shijianrenshu.id left JOIN yonghu yonghu ON a.yonghu_id = yonghu.id
and a.id in
#{item}
and ( a.shijianrenshu_id = #{params.shijianrenshuId} )
and ( a.yonghu_id = #{params.yonghuId} )
and a.shijianrenshu_liuyan_text like CONCAT('%',#{params.shijianrenshuLiuyanText},'%')
and UNIX_TIMESTAMP(a.insert_time) >= UNIX_TIMESTAMP(#{params.insertTimeStart})
and UNIX_TIMESTAMP(a.insert_time) <= UNIX_TIMESTAMP(#{params.insertTimeEnd})
and a.reply_text like CONCAT('%',#{params.replyText},'%')
and UNIX_TIMESTAMP(a.update_time) >= UNIX_TIMESTAMP(#{params.updateTimeStart})
and UNIX_TIMESTAMP(a.update_time) <= UNIX_TIMESTAMP(#{params.updateTimeEnd})
and a.shijianrenshu_id IS NOT NULL
and shijianrenshu.qiye_id = #{params.qiyeId}
and shijianrenshu.shijianrenshu_name like CONCAT('%',#{params.shijianrenshuName},'%')
and shijianrenshu.shijianrenshu_uuid_number like CONCAT('%',#{params.shijianrenshuUuidNumber},'%')
and shijianrenshu.shijianrenshu_types = #{params.shijianrenshuTypes}
and shijianrenshu.shijianrenshu_clicknum >= #{params.shijianrenshuClicknumStart}
and shijianrenshu.shijianrenshu_clicknum <= #{params.shijianrenshuClicknumEnd}
and shijianrenshu.shijianrenshu_clicknum = #{params.shijianrenshuClicknum}
and shijianrenshu.shijianrenshu_text like CONCAT('%',#{params.shijianrenshuText},'%')
and shijianrenshu.shijianrenshu_content like CONCAT('%',#{params.shijianrenshuContent},'%')
and shijianrenshu.renwuzhuangtai_types = #{params.renwuzhuangtaiTypes}
and shijianrenshu.shangxia_types = #{params.shangxiaTypes}
and UNIX_TIMESTAMP(shijianrenshu.insert_time) >= UNIX_TIMESTAMP(#{params.insertTimeStart})
and UNIX_TIMESTAMP(shijianrenshu.insert_time) <= UNIX_TIMESTAMP(#{params.insertTimeEnd})
and a.yonghu_id IS NOT NULL
and yonghu.yonghu_name like CONCAT('%',#{params.yonghuName},'%')
and yonghu.yonghu_phone like CONCAT('%',#{params.yonghuPhone},'%')
and yonghu.yonghu_id_number like CONCAT('%',#{params.yonghuIdNumber},'%')
and yonghu.yonghu_email like CONCAT('%',#{params.yonghuEmail},'%')
order by a.${params.sort} ${params.order}
